alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:27PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Columbia, northern Suwannee and southeastern Hamilton Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 427 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Suwannee Springs, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Live Oak, Jasper, White Springs, Suwannee Springs, Wellborn, Suwannee Valley, Mcalpin, Newburn and Houston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee
